title: Israel-Hezbollah ceasefire shows Iran a paper tiger
description: The Israel-Hezbollah ceasefire not only achieves Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s minimal goals of driving the Shiite Muslim militia away from Israel’s northern border and severely weakening its military capabilities but also shows its chief backer and enabler, Iran, to be a floundering paper tiger. title: The economic silver lining of disarming Hezbollah
description: It’s not just Israel that wants to see Hezbollah disarmed.
